typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		item_id as string,
		item_desc as string,
		current_price as double,
		wholesale_price as double,
		brand_id as integer,
		brand as string,
		class_id as integer,
		class as string,
		category_id as integer,
		category as string,
		manufact_id as integer,
		manufact as string,
		size as string,
		promo_id as integer,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		discount_cost as double,
		promo_name as string,
		promo_type as string,
		min_qty as integer,
		max_qty as integer,
		discount_active as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> postgresSQLItemInfo
source(output(
		HK_ITEM_ID as string,
		ITEM_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLHubItem
postgresSQLItemInfo select(skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTableData
SelectTableData derive(LOAD_DTS = currentTimestamp(),
		REC_SRC = 'ITEM_INFO') ~> Expression
Expression join(joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
